alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Terrebonne and central Lafourche Parishes through 330 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Houma to near Golden Meadow. Movement was west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Cut Off, Galliano, Larose, Lockport, Golden Meadow, Chauvin, Montegut, Bayou Cane and Gray. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
